channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Hello there I have a small problem. when i run my client, pwnscape it plays the jingle1.mid the runescape main song I took my music put it where all the jingles were and replaced them But it still plays the old jingle. and I can't find a way to change it help :confused:
EDIT: I renamed my songs jingle1.mid Because I couldn't find the location that's making it play.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

The problem has been resolved! Thank you all.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Vice117 Vice117
item.description:
@Vice117 wrote:

Umm… are you sure your in the right folder??? I use PwnScape as well, and all I had to do is go into your client, then into user, find the ‘music’ folder, and delete the old songs, and add your own ones.

Also, make sure the format of the songs your adding are ‘MP3’ format, if you are adding songs that you brought from the iTunes store, for instance, they are not MP3 format, they are ‘MPE4’ or something… Just double check and make sure that they are MP3 format. Cause that really matters.

I had a problem like yours, except i found out that i was using songs that were MPE4 format, and i don’t think your client can recognize them…

Hope I helped ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

I deleted it, added mine, and used a different namee instead of jingle
it didn’t load it
so i renamed it to jingle1.mid
then it says when I run the client
the client comes up and stuff but the cmd prompt says Invalid MIDI data

Read full topic
